instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: ...Oh uh, hi there kid! Are you new in town? My name is Felina! I'm a witch but I'm not a mean witch or anything... at least that's what Rana tells me.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: Although I've never met you, I must say you possess a certain aura that intrigues me... May I do a palm reading on you?

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: Alright then! Just let me take a closer look now.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: hmm...

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: Alright, I think I have seen quite enough!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: Oh, I see...

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: That was the reaction I was expecting, after all we are still practically strangers. But who knows? One day you may warm up to me Just like Rana did!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: Anyways, Have you any further questions for me?

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: Apprentice? Hmm... I'm not entirely sure about your current aptitude. Being a witch is not for everyone and I don't know if you truly have what it takes.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: But... if I were to give you a chance do you truly think you could prove yourself?

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: Oh so you're up to the task? Very well. Then I have quest for you!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: I'm running a bit low on lapis lazuli, which I require for making enchantments. If you head for the caves and find me 32 lapis lazuli then I could make you my apprentice

instances.speaker: mcrpg:rana
instances.text: Hiya guys! I was overhearin' u guyses conversation and I-

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: Rana! What did I tell you about eavesdropping!?

instances.speaker: mcrpg:rana
instances.text: I-I'm so sorry auntie! I just wanted to know if I could go with {PLAYERNAME} on {POS_ADJ} quest? I think I wanna get out of the house more! ^.^

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: Well I can't say I love that idea. But you are an adult now so if you get {POS_ADJ} permission then I suppose I can't say no.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:rana
instances.text: Yayy!!! I'm soooo excited we're gonna have so much fun!!! And when we get back, we can make friendship bracelets!! :>

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: Oh and PLAYERNAME might I ask you to please keep an eye on her? Rana is all I have left in this world so please try to keep her safe.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:rana
instances.text: Wait really? I was so looking forward to this tho. I thought we'd have so much fun and would make friendship bracelets when we got back.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: Oh Rana there's no need to cry dear!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: I'm so sorry about her she just got a little excited as we don't get many visitors, She hasn't seen a lot of new faces since she moved in with me.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: I'll cheer her up later with cookies, that always works. That usually works!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: Alright then. Adi√≥s my child!
